areas.name: Golden Gate Bridge
areas.addresses: Golden Gate Bridge, San Francisco, CA 94129
areas.description: One of the most recognized bridges in the world, the Golden Gate Bridge spans 1.7 miles and connects San Francisco to Marin County. It offers stunning views, pedestrian walkways, and is a popular spot for photos.

areas.name: Disneyland Resort
areas.description: The original Disney theme park, opened in 1955, Disneyland is a magical destination for families and Disney fans. It includes Disneyland Park and Disney California Adventure, full of rides, shows, and characters.

areas.name: Yosemite National Park
areas.description: Known for its breathtaking granite cliffs, waterfalls, and ancient sequoia trees, Yosemite is a UNESCO World Heritage site located in the Sierra Nevada mountains. It's perfect for hiking, rock climbing, and photography.

areas.name: Hollywood Walk of Fame
areas.description: Stretching over 15 blocks, this iconic sidewalk features more than 2,700 stars honoring celebrities from the entertainment industry. It's located near famous landmarks like TCL Chinese Theatre and Dolby Theatre.

areas.name: Napa Valley Wine Country
areas.description: A premier wine-producing region, Napa Valley is home to hundreds of vineyards and wineries. It's a top destination for wine tastings, gourmet dining, and scenic countryside views.

areas.name: San Diego Zoo
areas.description: One of the world's most famous zoos, the San Diego Zoo houses over 12,000 animals across 650 species. Located in Balboa Park, it's known for its lush habitats and conservation efforts.

areas.name: Lake Tahoe
areas.description: Straddling the California-Nevada border, Lake Tahoe is a popular year-round destination for skiing, snowboarding, hiking, and water sports. Its crystal-clear waters and alpine scenery make it a must-visit.

areas.name: Hearst Castle
areas.addresses: 750 Hearst Castle Rd, San Simeon, CA 93452
areas.description: Built by newspaper magnate William Randolph Hearst, this opulent estate features stunning architecture, art collections, and panoramic views of the Pacific Ocean. Guided tours explore its grand rooms and gardens.
